hero.title: All your technical documentation, instantly.
hero.subtitle: Upload PDFs, plans and manuals. Ask in natural language. Receive precise answers with exact references to the source.
hero.benefit1: Find specifications in less than 3 seconds
hero.benefit2: Extract data from plans and complex tables automatically
hero.cta_note: No credit card · Guided demo in 20 minutes

features.title: Elite Knowledge Engineering
features.subtitle: Designed for sectors where misinterpretation is not an option.
features.f1_desc: Interact with your manuals in natural language. Get expert and precise answers with direct references to the source document.
features.f2_desc: Native understanding of blueprints, electrical schemes, and complex diagrams with Gemini 2.0/3. Automatic component identification.
features.f3_desc: Automatic de-identification engine that protects emails, phones, and IDs before processing with AI. Data privacy by design.
features.f4_desc: Knowledge Graph (Neo4j) infrastructure to navigate complex technical relationships between components and procedures.
features.f5_desc: Robust asynchronous processing via BullMQ. Track heavy document analysis progress in real-time with automatic self-healing retries.
features.f6_desc: Proactive detection of workflow anomalies. Automatic alerts for error or latency spikes and server-side PDF technical reporting.
features.f7_desc: Create complex workflows with decision nodes (Switch/Case), delays (Wait), and iterations (Loop) through an intuitive visual editor.
features.f8_desc: 'Mission Control' execution logs panel to follow every step of your automations live, with detailed performance metrics.
features.f9_desc: Governance with human validation. Manage critical workflow escalations with industrial-grade audit traceability.
features.f10_desc: Automatic domain detection (Legal, Insurance, Healthcare) with dynamic analysis logic adaptation.
features.f11_desc: Streaming ingestion and intelligent deduplication to manage unlimited technical libraries without overhead.
features.f12_desc: Agentic loop that assesses juror feedback to refine hallucinated or incomplete responses with causal reasoning.
features.f13_desc: Structural compliance guaranteed. Automated multi-cluster routing (AUTH, LOGS, MAIN) to prevent cross-tenant leaks.
features.f14_desc: Dynamic report generation with full traceability, multi-language (ES/EN) support, and business-ready professional terminology.
features.f15_desc: Circuit breaker protection that ensures system availability even during critical failures of payment gateways or external services.
features.f16_desc: Industrial rule configuration engine for technical validation. Native categorization, prioritization, and multi-tenant isolation.

solutions.title: Industry Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Technical specialization built-in by default.
solutions.s1_desc: Technical order analysis and automatic comparison with safety regulations (EN 81-20/50).
solutions.s2_desc: Proactive risk detection in complex contracts and clause verification against case law.
solutions.s3_desc: Complex issue resolution by consulting service manuals and historical knowledge bases.

enterprise.title: Enterprise & Compliance
enterprise.subtitle: Security and control for professional teams with advanced governance.
enterprise.f1_desc: Dynamic RBAC/ABAC control with user overrides. Define complex policies per tenant and manage granular exceptions with our permission matrix.
enterprise.f2_desc: Financial-level security with dynamic CSP (Nonces), AES-256-GCM encryption, and atomic deduplication via MD5 hashing. Absolute data integrity even during high-scale ingestion processes.
enterprise.f3_desc: Native RAG evaluation dashboard with LLM Judge. Measure faithfulness and relevance of every response in real-time for maximum technical reliability.
enterprise.f4_desc: Export your knowledge in signed ZIP files. GDPR deletion certificates and fully integrated Audit Trail.
enterprise.f5_desc: 100% accessible platform complying with WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards. Interface optimized for screen readers and assisted navigation.

pricing.title: Plans designed for professional teams
pricing.subtitle: Total transparency. No hidden costs. Cancel anytime.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.subtitle: Your data is shielded at every layer of the process.
security.f1_desc: Database architecture physically isolated by tenant, ensuring absolute data privacy.
security.f2_desc: Data encrypted at rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS 1.3) under high-security standards.
security.f3_desc: You maintain full control over where your documents are stored and how they are processed.

about.title: Our Vision
about.subtitle: Powering the future of engineering with AI
about.mission_desc: Providing companies with intelligent tools to manage their accumulated knowledge with the utmost precision, security, and efficiency.
about.vision_desc: To be the go-to platform for knowledge management in high-complexity industrial sectors where reliability is paramount.
about.team_desc: We are a multidisciplinary team passionate about technological avant-garde and real impact on industrial processes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have any questions? We are here to help.
contact.address: Calle de la Técnica, 42, 28001 Madrid, Spain

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before you start.
faq.q1: Do I need to install anything or is it 100% web-based?
faq.a1: It is 100% cloud-based. You only need a modern browser. No complex installations or configurations required.
faq.q2: Are my documents used to train AI models?
faq.a2: No. Your data is private and is never used to train the base models of Gemini or any other provider.
faq.q3: How does multi-tenant data isolation work?
faq.a3: Each organization has its own vectorial namespace and logically separated database collections with independent encryption.
faq.q4: Can I cancel at any time?
faq.a4: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from the billing panel without penalties.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Last updated: January 23, 2026
terms.s1_intro: By accessing and using ABD RAG Platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
terms.s1_warning: If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use the Service.
terms.s2_intro: ABD RAG Platform is an agentic AI infrastructure designed for high-precision analysis of elevator orders and technical compliance. The Service includes:
terms.s3_f1_body: Attempting to decipher, decompile, or extract the source code.
terms.s3_f2_body: Commercializing access to the Service without written authorization.
terms.s3_f3_body: Performing massive scraping or DDoS attacks.
terms.s3_f4_body: Uploading documents that infringe on copyrights.
terms.s3_warning: Violation of these prohibitions will result in immediate account suspension without refund.
terms.s4_c1_desc: You retain all rights to the documents you upload. ABD RAG Platform does not claim ownership over your content.
terms.s4_c2_desc: The Service is the exclusive property of ABD Technologies S.L. and is protected by international intellectual property laws.
terms.s5_c1_desc: Monthly or annual charges. Prices may change with 30 days' notice.
terms.s5_c2_desc: Cancel anytime. Access continues until the end of the paid period.
terms.s6_p1: ABD RAG Platform is provided "as is". Our monthly Uptime commitment is 99.9%.
terms.s6_quote: "Our maximum liability for any claim is limited to the amount paid for the Service in the last 12 months."
terms.contact_desc: Our legal team is available for clarifications.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.s1_intro: At ABD RAG Platform, we collect only the information necessary to provide our documentary intelligence services:
privacy.s1_f1_body: Email, name, company, role within the organization
privacy.s1_f2_body: PDFs and files you upload for RAG analysis
privacy.s1_f3_body: Access logs, queries made, response times
privacy.s1_f4_body: Payment information processed by certified third parties (Stripe)
privacy.s2_f1: AES-256 Encryption: All documents are encrypted at rest
privacy.s2_f3: Multi-tenant isolation: Your data is physically separated from other clients
privacy.s2_f4: SOC2 Audits: Compliance verified by independent third parties
privacy.s2_f5: Automatic backups: Geographic replication with encryption
privacy.s2_f6: 2FA Authentication: Bank-grade security for your account
privacy.s3_intro: We use your information exclusively to:
privacy.s3_f1: Provide RAG analysis and semantic search services
privacy.s3_f2: Improve our AI models' accuracy (only with your explicit consent)
privacy.s3_f4: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
privacy.s3_warning: We never sell, rent, or share your data with third parties for marketing.
privacy.s4_intro: We retain your data according to the following policies:
privacy.s4_contact: You can request immediate data deletion at any time by contacting
privacy.s5_intro: Under GDPR and similar regulations, you have the right to:
privacy.s5_f1_body: Request a copy of all your data
privacy.s5_f3_body: Request complete erasure ("right to be forgotten")
privacy.s5_f4_body: Export your data in a structured format
privacy.s5_f5_body: Object to certain uses of your data
privacy.s5_contact: To exercise these rights, contact our DPO:
privacy.cta_desc: Our security team is available to resolve any doubts.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.subtitle: ABD RAG Platform's commitment to universal inclusion.
accessibility.commitment_p1: Our mission is to democratize access to high-precision documentary intelligence, ensuring our platform is usable by everyone, regardless of their capabilities.
accessibility.commitment_p2: We strive to comply with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA at a minimum, actively working to achieve higher standards.
accessibility.f1_desc: The entire interface is operable through logical keyboard shortcuts.
accessibility.f2_desc: Rigorous use of HTML5 tags for a clear information hierarchy.
accessibility.f3_desc: Color palettes optimized for maximum readability.
accessibility.contact_desc: If you encounter any accessibility barrier, please inform us to correct it immediately.

bulk.default_help: If no role is specified, TECHNICAL will be assigned automatically.
bulk.encoding_help: Ensure the CSV file uses UTF-8 encoding.

page.title: i18n Governance
page.subtitle: Manage the platform's voice across multiple languages with AI assistance.

notifications.upToDateDesc: No missing keys in this language.

dual_engine.title: Dual-Engine Extraction
dual_engine.subtitle: Combines traditional OCR with contextual intelligence to extract technical data with pinpoint precision.
problem_items: Traditional OCR fails with complex tables and technical diagrams
Critical errors in numerical values (voltages, dimensions)
Inability to extract relationships between components
solution_items: **AI Engine:** Contextual understanding of tables and diagrams

1.title: Image Pre-processing
1.desc: The PDF is converted into high-resolution images. Contrast enhancement and noise removal filters are applied.

2.title: Traditional OCR Extraction
2.desc: Tesseract OCR extracts all visible text. Text blocks, tables, and diagram areas are detected.

3.title: Contextual AI Analysis
3.desc: The AI analyzes the original images to understand relationships between elements, interpret complex tables, and extract data from diagrams.

4.title: Intelligent Fusion
4.desc: Results from both engines are combined. The AI corrects OCR errors and adds semantic context.

5.title: Data Structuring
5.desc: Final text is structured into JSON with metadata: component type, model, technical specifications, regulatory references.

case_1.title: Elevator Orders
case_1.desc: Automatic extraction of component models (motors, cables, panels) from technical order PDFs.

case_2.title: Service Manuals
case_2.desc: Indexing of maintenance procedures with specification tables and wiring diagrams.

case_3.title: Technical Regulations
case_3.desc: Analysis of EN 81-20/50 documents with extraction of safety requirements and compliance tables.

dual_engine.cta_desc: Upload your first technical document and see the precision for yourself.

compliance.title: Compliance & Portability
compliance.subtitle: Full portability and guaranteed regulatory compliance. Export your knowledge in signed packages and handle the right to be forgotten with legal certificates.
compliance.package_desc: Download your organization's entire knowledge corpus in a single compressed file. Includes original documents, indexed metadata, taxonomies, and embeddings in an open format.
compliance.gdpr_desc: Execute permanent purges of customer or project data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
compliance.sha_desc: Each export package includes an electronically signed manifest file. This ensures that data has not been tampered with since leaving our servers.
compliance.cert_desc: Upon completing a data purge, the system automatically generates a PDF certificate signed by ABD RAG Platform as legal evidence for regulators that data has been irreversibly destroyed.
compliance.cta_desc: Don't worry about regulatory compliance. We've built the tools so you only have to worry about your business.

audit_trail.title: Audit-Trail Pro
audit_trail.subtitle: Total traceability: every generated paragraph includes a direct citation to the original source document. Guaranteed regulatory compliance.
negative_items: **Legal risk:** Impossible to prove information origin
**Undetectable hallucinations:** AI can invent data without you noticing
**Impossible audits:** You don't meet ISO 9001, SOC2, GDPR
**Loss of trust:** Technicians don't trust sourceless answers
positive_items: **Exact citation:** Every statement links to the source document and page
**Instant verification:** Click the citation → original PDF highlighted
**Total trust:** Technicians can verify every data point

1.title: Metadata Chunking
1.desc: Every indexed text chunk includes full metadata: document name, page, paragraph, revision date, version.

2.title: Source Tracking
2.desc: During RAG generation, it records which chunks were used to generate each part of the response.

3.title: Automatic Citation
3.desc: The final response includes numbered references [1], [2], [3] linking to specific source documents.

4.title: Immutable Logs
4.desc: Every query is logged in MongoDB with timestamp, user, query, response, and sources used. Encrypted and non-modifiable logs.

audit_trail.example_query: What cable is specified for order P-2024-0156?
audit_trail.example_resp_text: For order P-2024-0156, an **8x19 Seale IWRC steel cable** is specified with the following characteristics:

example_ref_1.excerpt: Traction cable: 8x19 Seale IWRC, Ø10mm, breaking load 6370 kgf

example_ref_3.excerpt: Steel wire rope requirements for elevators - 8x19 classification

audit_trail.cta_title: Guarantee the Traceability of Your Analysis
audit_trail.cta_desc: Meet audits and regulations from day one. Every response is verifiable.

federated.title: Federated Intelligence
federated.subtitle: A global knowledge network that detects anonymous patterns across organizations to optimize technical suggestions and prevent known errors.
federated.value_1_desc: Benefit from patterns detected in thousands of technical documents without compromising privacy.
federated.value_2_desc: Data never leaves your tenant. Only abstract and anonymous mathematical patterns are shared.
federated.value_3_desc: Receive immediate alerts if your technical configuration matches a known failure pattern in the global network.

1.title: Local Pattern Extraction
1.desc: Our models analyze your technical documents looking for cause-effect relationships.

2.title: Anonymization & Hash
2.desc: Client names and identifiers are removed. The pattern is converted into an abstract vector using cryptographic hashes.

3.title: Network Synchronization
3.desc: The global network validates if other tenants have found the same pattern and publishes it if confidence is high.

federated.showcase_text: We've detected you're configuring a **VF-400 Inverter** with a motor distance exceeding 60 meters.
federated.showcase_tip: **Network Recommendation:** 82% of similar configurations in the sector increased the use of dU/dt filters to prevent motor voltage spikes.
federated.showcase_footer: This knowledge isn't in your manuals; it comes from the sector's collective anonymized wisdom.
federated.cta_desc: Take your technical precision to the next level with the sector's collective wisdom. 100% privacy guaranteed.

pdf_bridge.title: Advanced PDF Bridge
pdf_bridge.subtitle: High-fidelity Python/Node hybrid engine. Processing blueprints, diagrams, and technical tables with 99.9% precision via PyMuPDF.

tables.title: Dynamic Table Extraction
tables.desc: Our engine identifies invisible cell borders and maintains the logical structure of technical data.

layers.title: Multi-layer Analysis
layers.desc: Separates text from geometric vectors in engineering blueprints, indexing annotations in their original context.

fonts.title: Non-Standard Font Support
fonts.desc: Robust decoding of corrupt PDF files or custom character encodings.

pdf_bridge.quote: The bridge engine allows processing in 5 seconds what a human would take 15 minutes to transcribe.

2.title: Python Worker
2.desc: High-performance extraction via PyMuPDF C++ extension.

pdf_bridge.cta_desc: Don't settle for basic OCR. Get the precision your engineering department demands.

vector_search.title: Hybrid Vector Search
vector_search.subtitle: Semantic search that understands the expert's intent, not just keywords.

1.title: Semantic Embeddings
1.desc: Each chunk is converted into a 768-dimension vector using Gemini Embeddings.

2.title: MongoDB Atlas Indexing
2.desc: Vectors are stored with HNSW indices optimized for fast searching.

3.title: Query Transformation
3.desc: Your query is also converted to a vector, ensuring search happens in the same semantic space.

4.title: Cosine Similarity
4.desc: Cosine similarity is calculated between vectors. Highest similarity chunks are returned.

5.title: Hybrid Ranking
5.desc: Results are re-ranked combining semantic similarity with technical metadata.

results.text: EN 81-20:2014 - Safety requirements for car doors

vector_search.cta_desc: Try natural language queries and discover information traditional search misses.

mfa.title: Two-Factor Authentication (MFA)
mfa.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account using an authenticator app.
mfa.infoEnabled: Your account is protected. When logging in, you will be asked for a code generated by your app (Google Authenticator, Authy, Microsoft Authenticator, etc).
mfa.infoDisabled: Your account is currently only protected by your password. We recommend enabling two-factor to prevent unauthorized access.
mfa.disableConfirm: Are you sure you want to disable two-factor protection? Your account will be less secure.
mfa.setupStep1Desc: Open your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.) and scan the QR code on the left.
mfa.successDesc: Your account is now more secure.
mfa.recoveryDesc: Your account is now protected with bank-grade security.
mfa.recoveryCodesWarning: If you lose access to your authenticator app, these codes are the ONLY way to recover your account. Keep them in a safe place (e.g., a password manager).

sessions.title: Active Sessions
